%% Helpter command
\def\defevents#1#2#3#4#5#6{\xdef\Ea{#1}\xdef\Eb{#2}\xdef\Ec{#3}\xdef\Ed{#4}\xdef\Ee{#5}\xdef\Ef{#6}}
\def\defnperm-#1{\xdef\nperm{#1}}

\begin{document}
\foreach \perm in \perms {%
	\ifnum\perm<0
		\expandafter\defnperm\perm
		\ifcase\nperm
		\or
			\causetCrown
		\or
			\rcauset{3,5,1,4,2,6}{4/6}
		\or
			\rcauset{1,5,3,6,2,4}{1/3}
		\fi
	\else
		\expandafter\defevents\perm
		\pcauset{\Ea,\Eb,\Ec,\Ed,\Ee,\Ef}
	\fi
}
\end{document}
